subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: After Euro 2012, which begins on Friday, Andriy Shevchenko, 35, an icon to millions of people in his native Ukraine, hopes to move to the United States to play Major League Soccer.
snippet: After Euro 2012, which begins on Friday, Andriy Shevchenko, 35, an icon to millions of people in his native Ukraine, hopes to move to the United States to play Major League Soccer.
